section.title: How It
section.para: A simple 3-step process to exchange homes confidently and travel how you want â€” safely, affordably, and with peace of mind.

firstCard.title: Choose a plan
firstCard.para: Create your personal account and start with the plan you prefer (Base 1yr or Premium 2yr)

secondCard.title: Browse & Connect
secondCard.para: Find homes that match your criteria and connect with like-minded travelers.

thirdCard.title: Enjoy Your Stay
thirdCard.para: Finalize the exchange terms on the platform and get ready for the travel!.
